Keistimewaan Skatepark Cimahi: Standar Asian Games hingga Penerangan Mumpuni
03 Nov 2019, 10:17 by Ririn Nur Febriani
CIMAHI, (PR).- Revitalisasi Taman Kartini di Kota Cimahi turut menghadirkan arena khusus untuk pehobi skatebord yaitu skatepark. Hal itu disambut gembira sehingga aktivitas para pemuda kini terfasilitasi.
Skatepark yang berada di area Taman Kartini, Jalan Baros, Kota Cimahi itu baru selesai dibuat dan langsung diujicoba oleh Komunitas Skateboard Cimahi.
Megahudi, Humas Tim Cimahi Creative (TCC) sebagai pihak yang mendesain skatepark tersebut mengatakan perjuangan mewujudkan skatepark cukup berliku. Bahkan, pengajuan ke Pemkot Cimahi dilakukan sejak awal Wali Kota Cimahi Ajay M Priatna bertugas 2 tahun lalu.
"Sebagai pehobi dan yang mendesain, perjuangan ini betul-betul sangat berharga. Sejak tahun 1998 kami pulang-pergi ke daerah lain cari tempat main skate, baru di 2019 ini akhirnya bisa hadir skatepark di Cimahi," ujarnya.
Area Skatepark dibagi menjadi beberapa bagian seperti bowl ramp dan street ramp. Ada pula flat ground untuk pemula sehingga bisa belajar dengan aman tanpa mengganggu skateboarder pro.
"Kami sudah pasang quarter pipe, ramp, sama part lainnya buat ngulik skill skateboardnya. Ada juga ground khusus buat yang baru belajar, jadi bisa diawasi juga," bebernya.
Skatepark yang dibuat dengan beton berkualitas juga memenuhi standar Asian Games. Sehingga bisa dipergunakan untuk venue event skateboard sebagai pembinaan atlet skateboard usia dini.
"Perhitungannya sudah sangat matang, saya pribadi yang mendesain dan mensupervisi pembuatan skateparknya. Sudah menyesuaikan standar untuk event sekelas Asian Games, termasuk dengan penerangan jika event malam hari," bebernya.
Skatepark yang dibangun dengan dana CSR itu merupakan satu-satunya skatepark permanen di Bandung Raya, dan bisa digunakan tanpa perlu membayar alias gratis.
"Dibangun dari dana CSR yang menjadi milik pemerintah. Dibuat dengan konstruksi permanen, kalau yang di Bandung kan bisa dibongkar pasang. Jadi kami sangat apresiasi dukungan dan perhatian Pemerintah Cimahi untuk skateboarder," tuturnya
Pihaknya berharap pembangunan skatepark di Cimahi bisa menelurkan bibit skateboarder baru yang bisa mengharumkan nama Cimahi.
"Dulu kita kalau main bawa nama Bandung, karena latihannya di Bandung. Kalau sekarang, wajib mengharumkan nama Cimahi karena fasilitas dan sarana prasarana sudah sangat didukung Pemkot Cimahi,"  tandasnya.***

Privileges of Cimahi Skatepark: Asian Games Standards to Excellent Lighting
03 Nov 2019, 10:17 by Ririn Nur Febriani
CIMAHI, (PR) .- Revitalization of Kartini Park in Cimahi City also presents a special arena for skatebord hobbyists, the skatepark. This was welcomed so that the activities of the youth are now facilitated.
The skate park in the area of Kartini Park, Jalan Baros, Cimahi City was just finished being made and immediately tested by the Cimahi Skateboard Community.
Megahudi, Public Relations Team of Cimahi Creative (TCC) as the party who designed the skatepark said the struggle to realize skatepark is quite winding. In fact, the submission to the Cimahi City Government was made since the beginning of the Cimahi Mayor Ajay M Priatna on duty 2 years ago.
"As a hobbyist and designer, this struggle is really very valuable. Since 1998 we have commuted to other areas to find skating spots, only in 2019 can skate park in Cimahi finally appear," he said.
Skatepark area is divided into several sections such as bowl ramp and street ramp. There is also a flat ground for beginners so they can study safely without disturbing pro skateboarders.
"We have installed quarter pipes, ramps, and other parts to turn on the skateboard skills. There is also a special ground for those who are just learning, so they can be monitored too," he explained.
Skatepark made with quality concrete also meets Asian Games standards. So that it can be used for skateboarding event venues as a coaching for early-age skateboarders.
"The calculation is very mature, I personally designed and supervised the making of the skatepark. It has adjusted the standards for Asian Games class events, including lighting for night events," he explained.
The skatepark, which was built with CSR funds, is the only permanent skatepark in Bandung Raya, and can be used without paying for free.
"It was built from CSR funds that belonged to the government. Made with permanent construction, if it is in Bandung it can be dismantled. So we really appreciate the support and attention of the Cimahi Government for skateboarders," he said
He hopes that the development of a skatepark in Cimahi can spawn new skateboarder seeds that can make Cimahi the name.
"We used to play with the name Bandung, because the training was in Bandung. If now, we must make the name Cimahi proud because the facilities and infrastructure have been very supported by the City Government of Cimahi," he said. ***
